entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
